review: This is probably the greatest free roam fps game other than battlefield f2play...

Great and amazing Co-op Game, Chilling and scary Single Player and stupid amount of Zombies. Left FOr Dead 2 beats its predecessor and brings a game with the most scariest diffiiculties. Now that it has work shop it is much easier to install mods and maps. LFD2 is scary and well worth the price.
